body.name: CHLORYARD Small Dish Drying Rack, Compact Sink Dish Rack with 2pcs Silicone Drying Mats, Dish Drainer Kitchen Dish Organizer Sponges Holder for Kitchen Counter, Bar, Bottle, Cup
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 15 hrs 32 mins
features: SLIM DESIGN: This combination design features a slim drying rack and two removable silicone organizer trays, allowing for normal storage capacity while being perfect for tight spaces and smaller countertops. Suitable for campers, RVs, boats, cottages, apartments, and small space organizations.

VERSATILE DISH DRAINER: The compact dish drying rack easily fits on small kitchen or island counters, providing ample space for drying plates, glassware, cutlery, and more. It includes a removable silverware utensil caddy that keeps forks, spoons, and knives separated. Two non-slip mats are provided as an alternative to ensure the drainer remains secure and clean.

EXTRA SILICONE DRYING MAT: Features BPA-free, Eco-Friendly, the silicone organizer tray can be used on kitchen counters,sinks or bar, as a liner for refrigerators or drawers,a heatproof mat,a coffee cup or bottles mat,a non-slip pet food mat, even use it as a assucculents and other plants organizer tray.

PREMIUM QUALITY: The dish drying rack is constructed from sturdy steel wire with a durable finish. The removable utensil caddy is made of durable plastic, while the drying mat is crafted from flexible silicone. EASY CARE: clean with mild soap and water; drying mat only is dishwasher safe
THOUGHTFULLY SIZED: Dish rack measures 6.9“D x 16.5"W x 5.2"H. Drying mat measures 6.9”D x 16.5"W x 0.6"H
body.description: CHLORYARD Small Dish Drying Rack with 2pcs Silicone Drying Mats Narrow design: The Dish Drying Rack is a space-saving solution for small kitchens. Its narrow design takes up less countertop space than regular dish drying racks, measuring only 6.7 inches in width.2x Silicone Drying Mat: It comes with 2 Silicone Drying Mats that can be placed together or separately, providing flexible storage options without changing the overall storage capacity of the rack. Specifications Color: Black Material: Steel & Silicone Item Weight: 2.8 Pounds Weight Capacity: 25 Pounds

2x Drying Mat Comes with 2 x silicone drying mat. Keeps your countertop from wet. (without Drain spout) Easy to install Requires no installation, simply unpack and start using by inserting the pieces together. Dish Slots With slots to hold up 8 dishes and other mugs or cups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my use case
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I love the product.My use case: home photo developing in a bathroomPros:- small profile,- two rubber mats!! (hugely helpful for under the counter chemical bottles)- good quality materialsCons:- wish the plastic cup container thing had 2 slots, 1 square for utensils and one wide for a a sponge, the 3 square slots are limiting in use with nowhere great for a sponge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and easy to clean.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for our office kitchen. Great for small spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Space saving for small kitchens! Perfect size, shape and style! Love it and so glad I got the extra tray, it’s perfect for glasses & cups. Very compact yet study enough for full size plates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works in small spaces...somewhat
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to find a "strainer" for my son who has a dreaded "corner" sink in his kitchen. These seemed like a good solution. And they are slender... so slender that if you put a full size dinner plate in one they struggle to hold it. It works fine for salad bowls, cups, saucers, or lunch plates but anything larger and it's just overwhelmed. The base is a rubber mat so nothing drains - it evaporates. My son has hard water so the crusty buildup is irritating- not the strainer problem just a problem to deal with since the water stands in the mat. It's better than using a towel....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for an elderly woman who had just moved into a retirement community. There is not much counter space. This is working out beautifully. Doesn't take much space and is very sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality & Perfect Fit
reviews.reviewText: I have a very small area to dry my dishes & I was sure I wouldn’t find anything ….but this product was awesome!!Fit perfect & it’s not shabbily made! Heavy rubber mats too….I bought the dish rack with the extra rubber mat…and it was worth it to have an xtra space for drying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for baby dishes
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I don't have much counter space to spare. So this was perfect!It comes with the silicone mat for dripping water, actually came with 2 mats. The rack meets all my needs and serves the purpose for what I ordered it for. I folded a drying mat and put under just in case because I'm extra but there is no leaks or anything. I have had it for a few months now and no signs of rust either!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Small and slick. Perfect for small spaces with few dishes to dry.
